literalstring.name: Spreading potential weaknesses across diverse suppliers makes it harder for attackers to find and exploit critical entry points thereby reducing the likelihood of a coordinated "CAPEC-438: Modification During Manufacture" type attack.
literalstring.text: Spreading potential weaknesses across diverse suppliers makes it harder for attackers to find and exploit critical entry points thereby reducing the likelihood of a coordinated "CAPEC-438: Modification During Manufacture" type attack.
